row.process:
! kill process by name or ID @echo off :IF &UC4RB_PROCESS_NAME# <> "" taskkill /IM &UC4RB_PROCESS_NAME# /F :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_PROCESS_ID# <> "" taskkill /PID &UC4RB_PROCESS_ID# /T /F : ELSE : P "Error: Either Process name or process ID must be specified." : EXIT 1 : ENDIF :ENDIF :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
set timeout_var=&UC4RB_TIMEOUT# set count=0
:waitLoop
:IF &UC4RB_PROCESS_ID# <> "" tasklist /nh /fi "pid eq &UC4RB_PROCESS_ID#" | findstr /i "&UC4RB_PROCESS_ID#" >nul :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_PROCESS_NAME# <> "" tasklist /nh /fi "imagename eq &UC4RB_PROCESS_NAME#" | findstr /i "&UC4RB_PROCESS_NAME#" >nul : ENDIF :ENDIF
IF ERRORLEVEL 1 ( :IF &UC4RB_PROCESS_ID# <> "" echo Process with ID '&UC4RB_PROCESS_ID#' does not exist anymore. :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_PROCESS_NAME# <> "" echo Process with name '&UC4RB_PROCESS_NAME#' does not exist anymore. : ENDIF :ENDIF exit /b 0 )
timeout /T 1 set /a count=%count%+1 if %count% LEQ %timeout_var% ( goto waitLoop ) ELSE ( echo Timeout, process has not stopped goto abend )
